translations: n.连环图画；笑话；滑稽戏；反常的怪事（funny 的复数）

phrs.translation: n. 不道德的行为；不规矩的事

sentences.sentence: Interesting tidbits, videos and funnies from all over the world.
sentences.translation: 有趣的，视频和漫画来自世界各地。

sentences.sentence: Starting today I refuse to read the funnies till I hear from you.
sentences.translation: 从今天开始，我拒绝读任何笑话，直到收到你的信为止。

sentences.sentence: Marian's brother-in-law read the English page, as dedicated as a nice little boy reading the funnies.
sentences.translation: 玛丽安的妹夫在读报纸的英文专页，就像听话的小男孩在看滑稽连环画时那么专注。
